title: Paddy Gray (cricketer)
text: Paddy Gray (12 June 1892 – 19 July 1977) was an Australian <a href="cricket">cricket</a>er and <a href="rugby%20league">rugby league</a> player. He played seven <a href="first-class%20cricket">first-class cricket</a> matches for <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20cricket%20team">New South Wales</a> between 1922/23 and 1924/25. As a rugby league footballer he played first-grade for <a href="Glebe%20%28rugby%20league%20team%29">Glebe</a> in the <a href="New%20South%20Wales%20Rugby%20League">NSWRFL</a>.
